Tailored from premium winter fabric, this kandora delivers warmth, flawless drape, and a standout presence. Step into the season in style and let every occasion vibe with your confidence.

products.name: Kids’ Kandura | Classic Emirati Design Regular price
products.description:
Kids Kandura: A Blend of Tradition and Style
Telal presents a premium Kids Kandura designed exclusively for boys who deserve nothing but the best. Featuring a classic cut and high-quality fabric, this kandura ensures comfort and durability while reflecting the richness of Arabic heritage. Whether for festive gatherings or family outings, this outfit guarantees a refined and polished appearance.


The Kandura is a symbol of Arabic Tradition and Telal adds a touch of class to it. Whenever your little gentlemen need to be at the center of attention, they demand a level of quality none less than the best. Telal presents a special line of products for the boys.

*Please note, the egal,shimagh and sandal in the image is not included in the purchase*
